column2: mish <- scan(paste(path_to_manuscripts, "Hebrew_Mishneh", sep=''), what="character", sep="\n", comment.char = "#")
ber <-  scan(paste(path_to_manuscripts, "Hebrew_Bereshit", sep=''), what="character", sep="\n", comment.char = "#")
